title: Did Diahann Carroll Praise President Trump, Plead with Democrats to Stop Criticizing Him?
subtitle: Right-leaning web sites and Facebook pages shared an old meme that attributed a quotation to the veteran Broadway and Hollywood actor.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Between January 2017 and March 2018, Diahann Carroll publicly praised and defended President Donald Trump and pleaded with Democrats to end their criticism of him.
